violations: Missing PPE: Hard hats and vests
Workers in dangerous positions near operating machinery
Improper equipment usage: Open machinery without barriers
Blocked emergency exits or pathways: Stacks of materials obstructing paths
locations: Factory floor, near operating machinery without visible barriers
recommendations: Provide and enforce the use of PPE such as hard hats and high-visibility vests.
Ensure workers maintain a safe distance from operating machinery. Implement barriers if necessary.
Close or shield open machinery to prevent accidental contact.
Organize materials to clear pathways and ensure emergency exits are unobstructed.
worker_positions: Near the lower-right corner of the image

worker_identifiers.features: Wearing a blue shirt, no helmet, near green machine
